DOC.detailed_description: Dilation evacuation ( D & E ) commonly perform second trimester abortion management second trimester intrauterine fetal demise ( IUFD ) . Cervical preparation prior second trimester D & E increase safety . Osmotic cervical dilator prostaglandin analog use widely cervical preparation second trimester D & E . Osmotic dilator place cervical canal , radially expand absorb moisture decrease risk cervical injury D & E . Laminaria tent commonly use osmotic dilator D & E cervical preparation require N18 h reach maximum diameter . Dilapan-S® , synthetic osmotic cervical dilator , significant dilation effect 2 h placement majority expansion occur 4-6 h accord manufacturer . Misoprostol commonly use pharmacologic cervical preparation D & E duration action 2 4 h administration . Multiple study demonstrate safety misoprostol early second trimester abortion . One prospective four retrospective study suggest same-day cervical preparation Dilapan-S and/or misoprostol second trimester D & E 20 week safe effective . Misoprostol may less effective use alone compare overnight osmotic dilator cervical preparation later second trimester adjunctive benefit cervical dilation procedure time use overnight osmotic dilator 16 24 week . The effect appear pronounced N19 week gestation . No prospective study publish examine misoprostol adjunct osmotic dilator cervical preparation same-day D & E . Administration adjunctive misoprostol Dilapan-S potential effectively prepare cervix decrease operative time same-day D & E . We compare cervical preparation Dilapan-S without adjunctive buccal misoprostol same-day D & E 16 0/7 20 6/7 week gestation .
DOC.criteria: Age great equal 18 year ( upper age limit ) Gestational age 16+0 20+6 week gestation day D & E confirmation gestational age ultrasound Desires D & E termination pregnancy fetal demise Able provide write informed consent Able comply study procedure Englishspeaking Known allergy contraindication misoprostol Pregnancy multiple gestation Known bleed disorder current anticoagulation therapy ( within one month procedure ) Active bleed hemodynamically unstable enrollment Signs chorioamnionitis clinical infection enrollment Signs spontaneous labor cervical insufficiency enrollment
